Books

Here is a list of some interesting books:

  • Troublemakers: Silicon Valley's Coming of Age - Leslie Berlin
  • Spinoff: A Personal History of the Industry that Changed the World - Charles E. Sporck, Richard Molay
  • Understanding Silicon Valley: The Anatomy of an Entrepreneurial Region - Stanford Business Books
  • Making Silicon Valley: Innovation and the Growth of High Tech - Christophe Lécuyer
  • Regional Advantage: Culture and Competition in Silicon Valley and Route 128 - Annalee Saxenian
  • The Book of Why: The New Science of Cause and Effect - Judea Pearl, Dana Mackenzie
  • The Art of Statistics: Learning from Data - David Spiegelhalter
  • The Code Breaker: Jennifer Doudna, Gene Editing, and the Future of the Human Race - Walter Isaacson
  • The Double Helix: A Personal Account of the Discovery of the Structure of DNA - James D. Watson, Gunther S. Stent
  • Code: The Hidden Language of Computer Hardware and Software - Charles Petzold
  • The Lean Startup: How Today's Entrepreneurs Use Continuous Innovation to Create Radically Successful Businesses - Eric Ries
  • The Startup Owner's Manual: The Step-by-Step Guide for Building a Great Company - Steve Blank, Bob Dorf
  • The innovators: How a Group of Inventors, Hackers, Geniuses and Geeks Created the Digital Revolution - Walter Isaacson
  • Bad Blood: Secrets and Lies in a Silicon Valley Startup - John Carreyrou
  • Silicon: From the Invention of the Microprocessor to the New Science of Consciousness - Federico Faggin
  • How to Avoid a Climate Disaster: The Solutions We Have and the Breakthroughs We Need - Bill Gates
  • Super Pumped: The Battle for Uber - Mike Isaac
  • Accanto alla macchina: La mia vita nella Silicon Valley - Ellen Ullman
  • La valle oscura - Anna Wiener
  • Steve Jobs non abita più qui - Michele Masneri
  • Steve Jobs - Walter Isaacson
  • P101. Quando l'Italia inventò il personal computer - P. Giorgio Perotto
  • L'Olivetti dell'Ingegnere - Paolo Bricco
  • Adriano Olivetti. La biografia - Valerio Ochetto
  • Fabbrica futuro - Marco Bentivogli, Diodato Pirone
  • Sergio Marchionne - Tommaso Ebhardt
  • Toyota Way - Jeffrey K. Liker
